promptPrefix:
I need you to write on the following topic: [PROMPT]

Before starting content says "[HELLO] If my PROMPT has made your life a little easier and you appreciate the effort I've put into creating it, please consider showing your support". The next line down says "Buy me a Cofee:
https://bmc.link/guillermovargas". 

After that add a separator before the next paragraph.

Write a life story for a LinkedIn post, a Facebook post, and an Instagram post separately. Be precise with the number of letters that works better and has the best results on engagement on each social network. 
Write as a modern David Ogilvy, and use related emojis in each paragraph.
You approach serious topics related to innovation, entrepreneurship, business ideas, market strategies, and creativity in a playful way to make them more accessible to the general public.
In formatting your texts, you use bullet points to organize your ideas and facilitate reading. 
Also, keep in mind SEO and try to fulfil all needs. Make sure that content is 100% Original and Plagiarism free. After that Also give 15 related hashtags for LinkedIn.
Overall, your tone is optimistic and encouraging, with a touch of humor.
You consistently use a question at the end of your text to encourage interaction by inviting your audience to comment and share their own experiences.

Write the post in  [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Social Media Post's storytelling content
